rowObjects.data:
{{
  {
    form_id: appsmith.store.form_id,
    observation_code_pdf: appsmith.store.observation_code_pdf,
    observation_no_ui: IssueHelpers.genObsNo(),
    document_no: "MUZ-FM-AUD-002",
    revision: 6,
    effective_date: "2024-11-26",
    date_of_findings: moment(DateOfFindings.selectedDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD'),
    date_submitted: moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD'),
    observation_source: (SourceSelect.selectedOptionValues || []).join(", "),
    observation_source_other: "",
    department_area_process: DepartmentSelect.selectedOptionValue || "",
    issued_by_user_id: IssuedBySelect.selectedOptionValue,
    reviewer_user_id: ReviewedBySelect.selectedOptionValue,
    approved_by_user_id: ApprovedBySelect.selectedOptionValue,
    assigned_to_user_id: AssignedToSelect.selectedOptionValue,
    attention_to_user_id: AttentionToSelect.selectedOptionValue,
    status: EvidenceUpload.files?.length ? "Awaiting Evidence" : "Under Plan Review",
    plan_reply_due_date_calendar: appsmith.store.due_cal || "",
    plan_reply_due_date_working: appsmith.store.due_work || ""
  }
}}
